# CHANGELOG

## v2.5.0 / 2022-02-04

## v2.4.0 / 2020-01-01

- (@DABH) Node v12 support, fix node-unix-dgram issues, update dependencies

## v2.2.0 / 2019-08-14

- #[82], (@AlexMost) allow use of a customer producer

## v2.1.0 / 2019-02-17

- (@DABH) Fix tests by fixing error emission/handling
